```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(prophet)
library(janitor)
library(hrbrthemes)

options(scipen = 999)

theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
df <- df %>% 
  count(date) %>% 
  rename(ds = date,
         y = n)
  
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
m <- prophet(df)

set_periods <- 365

future <- make_future_dataframe(m, periods = set_periods, freq = "day")
```

```{r}
forecast <- predict(m, future) %>% 
  as_tibble()
```

```{r}
forecast
```

```{r}
plot(m, forecast)
```

```{r}
prophet_plot_components(m, forecast)
```
